name: Leaky Dam
description:
Relax in hot tub dam, life good. But then dam breaks. FIX DAM. But then it doesn't fix- dam gone. Think about how Beaver deforested bear home. Epically gets eaten alive by Bear.  

This Beaver doesn't have the engineering degree coded into it's brain from birth, forever cursed to make faulty dams.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Drop item/Swing Axe

Left Click - Swing Axe

Right Click - Eat Wood/Give Wood to Rat

Escape - Toggle Pause

WHAT TO DO

Repair your dam when it's broken by moving over the broken dam tile with either clay or wood. 

Run away from Bear.

Invest wood with the rat and it will give you back extra wood later.

Survive the winter every minute

Credits: 

'8BitDNA' music by Tim Beek https://timbeek.itch.io/royalty-free-music-pack 

Sound effects from Mixkit https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects 

'Tiny, Tiny Heros - Animals' by Kacper Wozniak https://thkaspar.itch.io/tth-animals 

Fire Animation by Brullov https://brullov.itch.io/fire-animation 

Leaky Dam created by Mango
